Description: Fragment of foot and floor of Attic black-glazed pottery stamped plate. Wholly glazed. Palmettes and rouletting on floor. Slight groove under resting surface. Incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 596)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1906)
